title: Add Timesheet
text: Contractor submits timesheet or uploads preassigned timesheet

title: Timesheet submitted
text: ITG Admin and Accounts nonfiction when timesheets are submitted

title: approve timesheet
text: Employer/reporting manager is notified to approve timesheet

title: generate an invoice
text: Once timesheets approved, ITG and account is notified to generate an invoice

title: sent to client/employer
text: Invoice generated based on approved timesheet and sent to client/employer
